ing: 1 cup ice cubes, or as desired
des: "Sapodilla tastes kind of like caramel flan to me. The strawberries and chocolate almond milk turn this smoothie into a delicious drink with various textures."
ins: Scoop sapodilla pulp out of the fruit and place it in a blender; add ice, chocolate-flavored almond milk, strawberries, and vanilla-flavored almond milk. Blend together until smooth.
